function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disproportionately negative impact of the pandemic on immigrants' labor market outcomes","Impact":"Long-term economic and social disparities, increased vulnerability to health risks","Mitigation":"Investment in education, skill-building, and access to healthcare, targeted support for immigrant communities","Technologies":"Data analysis, predictive modeling, targeted outreach and intervention tools","People":"Immigrants, immigrant youth","Owner":"Governments, NGOs, community organizations"},{"Description":"Stronger negative impact on migrant youth in the labor market","Impact":"Long-term economic and social disparities, increased vulnerability to health risks for migrant youth","Mitigation":"Specialized training and job placement programs, mental health and well-being support, community engagement and mentorship initiatives","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, job matching algorithms, telehealth and virtual support services","People":"Migrant youth, immigrant communities","Owner":"Education institutions, employers, mental health organizations"}]}
